name: wg-easy
description: wg-easy packages WireGuard VPN with a modern web-based admin interface. It lets you create peers, manage keys, view QR codes, and monitor usage from a simple dashboard, making self-hosted VPN setup and maintenance much easier.
features: WireGuard management: Configure and manage WireGuard VPN servers through an intuitive web interface.
Peer creation: Add new VPN clients with automatic key generation and configuration file creation.
QR code generation: Display QR codes for mobile devices to scan and connect instantly without manual configuration.
Configuration download: Download client configuration files for desktop or router setups.
Peer monitoring: View connection status, last handshake time, and data transfer for each peer in real-time.
Bandwidth tracking: Monitor upload and download statistics per peer to identify usage patterns.
Easy setup: Deploy a complete WireGuard VPN with web UI in minutes using Docker.
Peer management: Enable, disable, or delete peers without restarting the VPN server.
IP allocation: Automatically assign IP addresses to new peers from the configured subnet.
DNS configuration: Set custom DNS servers for VPN clients to use when connected.
Mobile optimized: Manage your VPN from smartphones with a responsive admin interface.
Security focused: Implement modern cryptography with WireGuard's proven security model.
